name: Muath Al-Duraym
tagline: Senior CS Student | Founder of Pixel Studio | AI & Cloud Enthusiast
shortBio: Senior Computer Science student at King Saud University, Founder/President of the Tuwaiq Academy Student Club. Founder of Pixel Studio, and a cool guy :)
longBio:
I'm a Senior Computer Science student at King Saud University, and I'm the type of person who loves turning ideas into something real.

That's exactly why I founded Pixel Studio, a game development studio where I've delivered projects from concept to release, building playable experiences that people can actually interact with.

I also founded and lead the Tuwaiq Academy Student Club at KSU, where I enjoy bringing people together, leading teams, and pushing initiatives that focus on hands-on projects and real outcomes, not just talk.

On the technical side, I'm genuinely passionate about AI. I'm currently in Stage 3 of KAUST Academy's AI Specialization, applying what I learn through practical work and real implementations. And while I'm not claiming to be a cloud expert yet, I'm deeply interested in the cloud and I'm learning it seriously, because I want to build systems that scale and run reliably in the real world.

Featuring a mix of engineering and leadership, I care about clean architecture, clear communication, and one thing above all: delivery.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

additionalEducation.title: Artificial Intelligence Specialization
additionalEducation.description: Finished the Second stage of the program

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Using technology to solve complex problems and deliver practical solutions.

values.title: Leadership
values.description: Leading initiatives and teams to achieve impactful results.

values.title: Continuous Learning
values.description: Always expanding knowledge in AI, cloud, and emerging technologies.
